nodes.text: The Blade of Nyenthi'Oris, meaning Blade of the Great Tree, was a one-handed sword created by the members of the Kerritamba Village in the Kkowir Forest of the planet Kashyyyk. It was said to "glitter" with the pride of the Kerritamba people and was only given to the most honorable of citizens. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, during the Galactic Civil War, one of these swords was awarded to a spacer who had been of immense help to the village and its citizens. The sword was given to the spacer by Chief Kerritamba after the sentient had cured the village's Great Tree of an unknown illness.

The Blade of Nyenthi'Oris appeared in Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees, a 2005 expansion pack for the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided prior to the games closure on December 15, 2011. developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It was a reward for the player after they assisted the Kerritamba villages in healing their Great Tree of an unknown sickness. It is listed in the Star Wars Galaxies: The Total Experience: Prima Official Game Guide and the Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Guide: Prima Official Game Guide in a list of weapons and their general statistics. With the release of Game Update 5 on June 28, 2008, players were able to deconstruct this and many other unique weapons into a schematic, which they could then bring to a Munitions Trader and have the weapon recreated by the Trader, vastly improving its combat effectiveness.
